title: 820-2533 Green Light No Fan Spin
message:
Its a honour to be in this forum with Louis and Duke, Sorry my bad english , And sorry if any error on my first Post

Wich are my next steps?

Thanks!!

title: 820-2533 Green Light No Fan Spin
message:
I have PPBUS with 12,62 V, Battery sensors ( The blinking green lights) works, and when plug Battery it turns Green Light into Amber!!

Thanks

title: 820-2533 Green Light No Fan Spin
message: PP3V3_S5 present ??? Voltage in PP1V05_S5 ?? If you have something other than 1.05V, replace C7771 .... You should also use power pads (R5014 or R5015) to power on the board, it does not power on by itself ...

title: 820-2533 Green Light No Fan Spin
message:
Hi Aprendiz :);)

PP3V3_S5 OK (3.3 v)
PP1V05_S5 OK (1.06 v)

I thought that it auto-Powers on, sorry. Its becouse its a core 2 Duo ?

Our new steps are ? :D

Thanks

title: 820-2533 Green Light No Fan Spin
message: Power button must be pressed to power on. Are you using a REAL APPLE 85W charger? Tried with a known good charged battery?
